item.title: About
item.description: This is a test website using the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.

item.title: About Me
item.description: I am an engineer / scientist by training and a patent agent by profession. I studied Materials Science and Engineering (chemistry, physics, and engineering) at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology. As an undergraduate I learned about many different materials, such as metals, ceramics, polymers, and semiconductors. I did my graduate work on electronic materials, like those used in integrated circuits and electronic devices. Later I got my MBA at INSEAD in Fontainebleau, France.
